1111.content:
Jenny Weasley woke up slowly on the morning of her thirteenth birthday by the loud rumble of thunder which could be heard from the distance.

“Man… what a way to wake up…” she groaned, as she stumbled out of bed. she groggily looked at her digital clock, which indicated that it was only 4:55 AM in the morning. “I’d better unplug my computer!”

She moved his mouse over the mouse mat so that the screen came on, and she tapped on the keyboard, curiously looking to see if there were any new emails for her, before she would shut down the laptop and unplug it from the wall, due to the oncoming thunderstorm, which was so common in the state of Alabama during the hot summer months.

“Ahh… birthday wishes… more birthday… what’s this? ‘Greetings from the Greek Gods?’” Jenny thought, as she was quietly reading the email subjects. The last subject sounded interesting, as she clicked on the title.

“Dear Jenni Weasley, Greetings on your thirteenth birthday. Today, you will discover your great strength and your true origin will be revealed. You’ll learn that you’re one of us. Have a Happy Birthday! Signed, Hercules, your real father.”
Jenni gasped out loud. “Is this some kind of a joke?”

BOOM!

“I’d better unplug my laptop!” Henry said, as panic set in. Flashes of light lit up the dark sky outside, and she could see the flashes through the window.

Jenni quickly shut down his laptop and unplugged the cable from the power. She did it just in time, as there was another loud rumble of thunder when the power went out for two seconds, before coming back on.

“Me? The son of Hercules? That has got to be some sort of a joke!” Jenni murmured to herself, as she quietly walked to the bathroom. She was only 5 foot 4 inches tall with short, light brown hair and brown eyes. She was skinny as a board and she only played a little tennis in middle school. She was just starting the seventh grade and she was certainly no athlete. She was very average in everything she did and she often got bullied since she wasn’t very big, tall, or popular.

She did her business before going back to bed.She knew that his mom loved him, even though she had been adopted as a baby. She had no idea who his real father was. She had told him that his father had died in Iraq. But, there was no way his father was a Greek God. Or, was there?

She woke up again that morning. It was a school day and she hated it. She flexed her biceps but felt nothing different. Jenni said ' well, it must be just a dream. She got dressed and ate her breakfast.
While she waited for the school bus, FATE had plans for her to discover her strength. It happens

1112.content:
Henry Storm woke up with a start on the morning of his thirteenth birthday by the loud rumble of thunder which could be heard from the distance.

“Man… what a way to wake up…” he groaned, as he stumbled out of bed. He groggily looked at his digital clock, which indicated that it was only 4:55 AM in the morning. “I’d better unplug my computer!”

He moved his mouse over the mouse mat so that the screen came on, and he tapped on the keyboard, curiously looking to see if there were any new emails for him, before he would shut down the laptop and unplug it from the wall, due to the oncoming thunderstorm, which was so common in the state of Florida during the hot summer months.

“Ahh… birthday wishes… more birthday… what’s this? ‘Greetings from the Greek Gods?’” Henry thought, as he was quietly reading the email subjects. The last subject sounded interesting, as he clicked on the title.

“Dear Henry Storm, Greetings on your thirteenth birthday. Today, you will discover your great strength and your true origin will be revealed. You’ll learn that you’re one of us. Have a Happy Birthday! Signed, Hercules, your real father.”

“Say what?” Henry gasped out loud. “Is this some kind of a joke?”

BOOM!

“I’d better unplug my laptop!” Henry said, as panic set in. Flashes of light lit up the dark sky outside, and he could see the flashes through the window.

Henry quickly shut down his laptop and unplugged the cable from the power. He did it just in time, as there was another loud rumble of thunder when the power went out for two seconds, before coming back on.

“Me? The son of Hercules? That has got to be some sort of a joke!” Henry murmured to himself, as he grabbed quietly walked to the bathroom. He was only 5 foot 4 inches tall with short, light brown hair and brown eyes. He was skinny as a board and he only played a little tennis and volleyball in middle school. He was just starting the seventh grade and he was certainly no athlete. He was very average in everything he did and he often got bullied since he wasn’t very big, tall, or popular.

Henry took a leak before going back to bed. He knew that his mom loved him, even though he had been adopted as a baby. He had no idea who his real father was. She had told him that his father had died in Iraq. But, there was no way his father was a Greek God. Or, was there?
1112.title: Male

choices: Justin takes Henry to the gym for a workout

11121.content:
Cindy Storm had woken up while the thunderstorm was still raging outside. She pulled out the small chocolate cake from the fridge and set it out on the dining table, so that her son would see it. She knew that her boy was an early riser, and she wanted to be ready for him when he would get up. The chocolate cake had the words “Happy Birthday Henry” written on it in bright blue frosting on the dark brown chocolate background, knowing that this was the type of cake that Henry requested every year for his birthday.

“Mom…” Henry moaned, as soon as he got out of the bedroom.

“Happy Birthday, sweetheart!” Cindy grinned, as she gave her boy a big hug. “I got you your favorite: Chocolate cake!”

The two sat down early in the morning as she cut two pieces from the cake and served them up on two small plates.

“Thanks, mom…” Henry smiled, as he took his spoon and began to take a bite out of his first piece.

“Justin, the boy next door, had invited you over to play video games when he’s up. I have to go to work, sweetie, so you got the house all to yourself, okay? Call me on my cell if you need anything!” Cindy said, as she continued to eat her slice of cake.

“Thanks, mom! I’ll be here. I’m not going anywhere, with this bad weather. I’m just happy I don’t have to go to school in the pouring rain!” Henry noted, since it was in the middle of summer.

Cindy quickly finished her cake before she showered and got dressed to go to work. She worked in a large office building near the downtown area in Miami, and she was already looking forward to the weekend so she could take Henry to the beach.

“Well, take care and lock the house if you go out to Justin’s. We’ll go to the beach this weekend, okay?” Cindy said, as she was about to walk out the door.

“Okay, see you tonight. Bye, mom!”

Henry finished his cake and put everything away in the fridge for later. Then he just put on his shoes and a pair of shorts and a t-shirt before he headed out to the house next door. As soon as he knocked on the door, a tall, lanky kid with curly hair opened up.

“Hi, Henry! Happy Birthday, dude!” Justin said; as he held the door open wide for the shorter boy. Henry ran inside since the rain started up again, and the two sat down on the couch for a few minutes until Justin led him to the garage.

“Dude, I wanna finish my work out before I hit the video games, okay? You can spot me if you want!” Justin instructed as he got down on the bench and wrapped his hands on the bar. He began lifting the bar up and started pressing the bar up and down as he lay flat on his back. Henry just stood there, where Justin’s head was, and looked down while he watched Justin do his work out.

When Justin did his final rep, he struggled to lift the bar back up. It took him longer to raise the bar up to the metal post, where the bar would rest on. Henry saw that Justin was struggling with lifting the bar, and he realized that Justin needed help. He quickly reached under with his hands and grabbed hold of the bar, raising it up and gently placing the bar on the posts.

“Dude! Are you okay? You had a hard time during that last rep!” Henry noted, as Justin got off the bench.

“Yeah… I couldn’t lift it. Do you want to give it a try?” Justin asked him.

Henry got on the bench and began lifting the bar with the weights. Immediately, he felt as if his arms and his pectorals began getting tighter and stronger. It almost seemed weird. It was as if his muscles started growing right away!

Henry did about fifteen reps, when he set the bar back on the post. He wasn’t even tired at all! He sat up, and flexed his arm. He noted that his chest felt very firm and hard as well.

“Dude! Have you ever worked out before?” Justin asked him.

“No! This is my first time… ever!” Henry replied.

“What? You look like… Your arms and your chest… You look like you’ve already gained some muscle! That is amazing!”

Henry just shrugged. Nobody grows muscle that fast, could they?
11121.title: Henry Storm discovers his superhuman strength

1153211.content:
Your name is Thomas Dworakowski, you're 16 years old, and you're a sophomore in high school. It was the fourth week of the summer vacation, and you had just acquired a part-time job at a sandwich restaurant. During the day you help your mother around the house, and you take care of Lucas, your 12 year-old brother. Your parents are divorced and you're pretty much the man of the house.

That night, you're laying in bed, and you're having a hard time falling asleep. You look up through the large window, which is right above your bed, which is in the corner of your small bedroom, and you see what appears to be a falling star in the nighttime sky. Then, moments later, a bright light appears shining through the window, lighting up your bedroom.

"Oh man, why is someone shining their flashlight at my window?"

The light grows brighter, and you can't even look at it.

Then, out of nowhere, a man appears standing in your room. He is tall and muscular, and he's wearing a strange jumpsuit, all white. It almost looks like some sort of superhero costume.

"Thomas! You have been chosen to receive our special vision powers!" the man spoke in an authoritative voice.

"What? Who... Who are y-y-you?" You stutter, as you begin to tremble with fear.

"I cannot reveal my identity to you, my human friend... I don't have much time... My mission is to grant you your powers! When I'm done, your memory of this encounter will be permanently erased!"

"Hey! W-what? What... What are you d-d-doing?"

The strange being extended his right hand and aimed his index finger at your face. Then, a blue beam of light shot from the tip of his finger, striking you in the forehead, and instantly knocked you unconscious!

You woke up, hours later, not remembering anything that had happened and finding yourself all alone in the bedroom. Nothing was moved or touched, and everything seemed the same as before.

"Man... What a weird night..." you say groggily, as you slowly roll out of bed.

By the bright light shining through the windows you could tell that it was already daylight.

Mom had already gone to work and Lucas was sitting in front of the TV, playing his video games, when you stumble into the kitchen.

Suddenly, you hear the sound of a car passing and stopping in front of the house. You just look up, at the front door. Next thing you know, the door, and the entire front wall of the house seems to become transparent to you, allowing you to see the front lawn, the sidewalk, and the street, which ran in front of the house! You saw the mailman pulling up, and placing the mail in the mailbox!

"The mail just got delivered!" you mumble out loud.

"How do you know?" Lucas replied.

'I... I just saw it!" you say.

Lucas just turned and stared at you with a confured look on his face.

"What are you talking about? How can you see that from inside of the house?"

Then it dawned on you: You have x-ray vision!

"Oh man... I... Uhh... I have no idea how I did that..." you whisper to yourself.

What happens next?

You're pretty hungry in the morning and you had a craving for a bowl of Frosted Flakes cereal with cold milk.

You walk up to the fridge and grab the open cereal box with one hand. Then you go up to the cupboard and you grab a glass with the other hand. Now both hands are full, and you realize that you need to walk over to the table, set everything down, and then come back to the cupboard and get the bowl.

Then it dawns on you, that you might have other vision-powers, and now would be a great opportunity to use them!

You stare at the bowl, which is on the top shelf, and you concentrate. Something inside of you tells you that you possess some kind of "force vision" in addition to the x-ray vision, which you had just used for the very first time.

Purple beams of light shoot from your eyes and strike the bowl, making it rise up from the cupboard, hover towards you, and float in front of you as you turn and walk towards the dining table. There, you gently set the bowl on the table, and you cut off the "force vision".

Luckily, Lucas didn't see any of it!

"That was so cool!" you chuckle to yourself. "I gotta test my other powers!"

You eat your cereal and think about where you may go to test your powers later on. Of course, you know that you have to go to work that night as well...

115321111.content:
You decide to sit on the couch in the living room for awhile, watching your little bro play HALO on the Xbox. As you look around, you spot mom's little plant in the pot, that appears to be whithering.

"Oh man, I better give the plant some water..."

You grab the little pot and take it to the kitchen, where you hold it under the faucet. After you give it a little water, you stare at it for a few seconds.

Your plant vision kicks in, as green laser beams flash from your eyes and strike the plant, causing it to grow several inches taller!

"Whoa... That is just totally cool!" you say with a wide grin on your face, as you carefully set the plant back on the coffee table. "Mom will be happy with that!"

As you look around some more, you spot the little, round ash tray on the coffee table. The ash tray was made of aluminum, and it was about three inches in diameter.

You let your size-vision kick in, as pink beams of light strike the ash tray, and enlarge it to 5 inches in diameter!

"Whoops! A bit too big..."

Pink beams shoot from your eyes and hit it again, reducing the ash tray to 4 inches in diameter. You're happy now!

"Much better!" you laugh.

When it's almost time to go to work, you get up and gather your clothes. While you're in the shower, there is a brief power outage, which lasted about two minutes. During that outage, you were left completely in the dark, while you were stark naked in the bathroom.

Then, broad, bright yellow beams of light came from your eyes, illuminating everything in front of you, like you had your own built-in flashlights inside of your eyes.

"Hey! This is pretty useful, having this night vision!" you giggle.

When the power comes back, you switch off your night vision.

"Ha ha! I don't need any batteries, either!" you laugh, as you dry off and get dressed for work.

Finally, you get outside and drive to work...

You wonder how much fun you'll have with your powers at the restaurant!

1153211111.content:
You arrive at the restaurant and you're assigned two tables right away. You take their orders and you pass them along to the cooks in the kitchen. One of your guests, an elderly man, had ordered a hamburger. You serve him his burger and pour him a large sweet tea. Right away, he complains that his hamburger was cold.

You apologize and take his plate containing the burger and walk back to the kitchen. Inside, you see that everybody's super busy and nobody has time to heat up your burger. So, you quickly remove the bun, and fire up your heat vision. Red beams of light come from the pupils of your eyes and strike the beef, heating it instantly until it starts to simmer. Then, you cut of the heat vision, and replace the bun. You walk back to the table with a smile on your face.

"Here you go, sir" you say politely, as you set the plate on the table. "I heated it up for you. I'm sorry about that!"

The man took a bite and smiled. He was happy. You knew you did good and you anticipated getting a good tip from him.

Next, you served up some sweet tea but you forgot to pour some ice into the lady's cup.

"Young man! My sweet tea isn't cold!" the lady complained.
You take the cup and walk back to the bar, but the bartender still hasn't refilled the ice machine yet.

So, you think of a solution. You remove the lid from the cup and fire your freeze-vision, cooling the sweet tea just enough so that it doesn't turn to ice. You walk back to the table and set the cup back down.

"Here is your sweet tea, ma'am. Nice and cold!" you tell her. "I'm sorry about that!"

You end up getting a good tip!

In the end, by the time it was time to go home, you were really happy you had your cool vision powers!

11532111111.content:
You finally come home after a long afternoon and evening at work, feeling pretty tired but satisfied. After all, you made almost fifty Dollars in tips, and you made up for several stupid mistakes, thanks to your cool vision powers!

As soon as you walk in the door, Lucas comes jumping around the living room. You wonder why your little brother is still awake, at 11 o'clock at night?

"Lucas! Why aren't you in bed?" you say to your 12 year-old little bro.

"I was home all day! I was bored!" he whines.

You wish he were older so he could also go out and get a job, or at the very least, get a girl friend. Then it dawns on you...

"Hey, Lucas... See mom's plant and ash tray, on the table?"

"Yeah! Did you make them bigger?" he asks you.

"I wonder... if I have a vision that can make him older... Hmmm..." you mumble to yourself.

"What's a vision?" he asks you.

"Go stand by the coffee table for a sec, will ya?"

"What are you gonna do?"

"I'm gonna make you older!"

"Oh COOL! Can I be older than you?" he just had to ask that.

"Fine, Lucas... Now stand still, will ya?"

You swear the boy can't stand still for three seconds!

There! Now, you fire the Age vision at him, with the intent of making it age your brother. As the turquose rays leave your eyes and strike Lucas in the chest, you see him suddenly growing taller and bigger at the same time! It's working!

"Oooohh Cooollll" he says, as he feels his body expand rapidly.

Lucas' arms are growing longer and his feet are expanding. His hands are expanding, while his muscles are bulging everywhere. Your brother is aging before your very eyes, thanks to you! You see a 12-year-old boy go through puberty in a matter of seconds, as he passes through 13, 14, 15 years-old. He shoots up like a weed, and he's the same height as you in no time the moment he turns 16. Then, he passes you, as he grows older. Hair sprouts everywhere, and his face ages gracefully. He grows a thin beard and a mustache, while his muscles continue to expand.

Finally, you cut off the hypno vision when you guess he has reached age 20.

"Whoa!" Lucas says, in a deep, baritone voice. "This is amazing!"

You're now looking UP to your former "little brother", who is about 6 foot 4 inches tall.

"You were 4 years younger than me, and now you're 4 years older!" you say to the big, tall man standing before you.

"Thanks, Tom... I owe you one!" Lucas replies with a chuckle.

There, that took care of the little-brother-problem!

You realize that if you can make people older, you can also make them younger! You really begin to love your vision powers!

115331.title: Radiation.

1153311.content:
BEEP! BEEP! BEEP!

Artemis groaned, trying to stay asleep despite the alarm. After a few attempts, his hand found the snooze button, stopping the constant beeping. He slowly sat up, his royal blue eyes slowly opening. As he went to get dressed for another day at school, he heard an audible clicking sound. Looking around, he saw it was the Geiger counter his dad had given him. Artemis had always been interested in anything nuclear, so his dad had given him an old counter from the power station he worked at. This time, however, the clicking sped up rapidly as Artemis picked up the counter.

"Huh, weird. It's never done that before." he said. After getting dressed, he put the counter in his bag, to see if it kept going like that. As he biked to school, he listened to the radio on his MP3.

"In other news, there have been numerous outbreaks of crime throughout the world. Many of the witnesses reported the crimes were committed by children or teenagers with bizarre abilities, such as throwing a car through a wall. Apparently, these individuals call themselves 'The Blessed'. Anyone who sees one of these people is urged to call police as soon as possible." they reported.

"No way. This is too weird." Artemis muttered, as he arrived at the gates to the school. After securing his bike, he met up with his friend Cynthia.

"Hey Artemis, you hear what they said on the news?" she asked.

"Yeah." he replied.

"Think they'll show up here?"

"Nah, nothing exciting happens around here." he replied, as the two headed off to class.
1153311.title: Male.

11533111.content:
As the day went on, Artemis kept thinking. He couldn't work out why the Geiger counter was stiil reading far higher than normal. At the beginning of each class, the teacher would first warn the class about The Blessed, and to watch out for them. Finally, Artemis and Cynthia made it to lunch.

"Man, The Blessed sure ahve the teachers spooked." Artemis said.

"Yeah, but with those powers, why wouldn't they be worried?" Cynthia asked him.

"I guess you-" Artemis was cut off, as the wall they were all near was destroyed. As the dust cleared, three boys and a girl walked through.

"All right everyone! Don't move!" ordered the tallest boy, clearly the leader. "We are The Blessed, and we have reason to believe someone here has powers as well. They have two choices; die, or join us. So, which of you is it?" Cynthia grabbed Artemis' arm, while Artemis suddenly wondered.

"Could the Geiger counter's weird behaviour mean I'm the one they're after?" he thought. The boy, obviously irritated, turned to the girl.

"This is going nowhere. See if you can figure out who it is." he told her. The girl nodded, closing her eyes. After a few seconds, she opened them again. Then she pointed at Artemis.

"It's him." she said,

"You sure?" he asked. The girl nodded. The boy then approached Artemis, as everyone else stared. "So, what's it gonna be?" he asked.

"No." Artemis replied.

"What;d you say?"

"I said no." Artemis repeated. Then, some invisible force began choking him. Artemis fell to his knees, gasping for air.

"Artemis!" cried Cynthia.

"Well then, time to die." announced the boy. Artemis was then thrown into the wall, leaving a small crater. As he struggled to his feet, he was hit by chunks of ice from one of the other boys. Then, Artemis felt a large pain shooting through his head.

"ARGH!" he cried, kneeling on the ground clutching his head. At that moment, the leader of the group noticed the Geiger counter that had fallen from Artemis' pocket. Instead of a steady clicking, the device was screaming like a siren. Then, the third boy charged at Artemis.

"No, wait!" the leader shouted. But the boy kept running. However, once he got close to Artemis, the boy screamed, before collapsing on the ground, dead.

"That idiot! Everyone back off! This guy's putting out serious radiation!" he shouted. Turning to Artemis, he said "You monster! Look at what you've done! You'd better leave this place before I kill you, and don't come back!" Artemis realised the boy was right. He couldn't control his powers, and he was dangerous. Artemis concentrated, focusing the radiation around his body, By ionising the air, itr made surrounding air rush in, creating thrust. Artemis lifted up off the ground, before soaring away.

"Cynthia, Mom, Dad, I'm sorry." he thought, crying as he flew away.
11533111.title: A Power And A Curse.

115331111.content:
As Artemis flew, a realisation hit him. He realised that the radiation his body was generating had to have come from somewhere else, otherwise it would stop after a while.

"So that means, if my body absorbs radiation, I can survive on radiation alone." he thought. After this, Artemis decided where he could go, so that there would be no people around, and the background radiation would be more than sufficient; Chernobyl. Aboandoned following a nuclear meltdown at the local nuclear reactor, the city had been a ghost town for years. His route decided, Artemis headed for Chernobyl.

A day later

After what seemed like an eternity, Artemis landed on the outskirts of Chernobyl. It looked just like what the documentaries showed; buildings falling into disrepair, cars abandoned on the street, complete silence.

"Still, at least here, I can't hurt anyone." he said, walking off to look around. Surprisingly, he didn't find it as spooky as he'd imagined. It almost felt...peaceful. After a few hours wandering, Artemis found a building with a reasonably intact top floor, which still had galss in the windows and a decent view of the city, and the power plant beyond.
115331111.title: Learning.

choices: Artemis returns home, only to notice The Blessed have taken over.
Artemis returns home, reunites with his family/friends, and continues his life.
1153311111.content:
Before anyone asks, Sv/h is a way to measure radiation levels. It stands for Sieverts per Hour. uSv/h is microsieverts per hour, etc.

"Well, this seems like a nice place to live for a while." Artemis said to himself, shedding a tear. He realized that until he understood his powers, he's have to quarantine himself in the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone. "Well, for starters, my powers seem to be tied to radiation. So, I need to lots of things out." Artemis continued talking to himself. "Well, I'm obviously not harmed by the radiation. So, there's that. Maybe more radiation makes me stronger..." He pondered. Artemis whipped out his trusty Geiger counter, and looked at the reading. It said 5 uSv/h. Higher than the average background radiation of Earth (0.1 - 0.2 uSv/h), but not high. He decided to see if his physical strength was augmented by the radiation. The teen walked up to a large wall, and punched it. He noticed many small cracks in the wall that were not there before. "Now, let's go somewhere with more radiation." He said as he walked out of the room.

"Chernobyl Reactor #4. Caution, deadly radiation. Perfect." Artemis grinned as he entered the building. He checked the Geiger counter, and noticed that it overflowed. However, he realized that he was able to measure radiation levels himself. He measured that the control room, where he was standing, was reading at 300 Sv/h. To a normal person, this would mean a lethal dose of radiation in one minute. However, radiation acted differently with Artemis. He noticed that he felt very powerful in the room. However, he was there for testing purposes. He figured that if he was going to notice any differences in strength, it would be in this room. Scanning the room, Artemis found a large piece of debris on the ground. Artemis walked towards it, and tried to lift it. While it was larger than him, he lifted the debris like a piece of paper. "Okay, more radiation equals stronger me. Good to know." Artemis said to himself as he put the debris down. "However, I need to figure out what exactly I can do, and how to make sure I don't continue emitting radiation. I don't want to give people cancer." Artemis used the same tactic he picked up in the school to fly out of the reactor, and into the heart of Pripyat, a city in the exclusion zone. He noticed that the radiation calmed to a relatively low 1 uSv/h. Artemis held his Geiger counter next to himself to see how much radiation he was emitting. It read 10 uSv/h. Too much. He wanted to lower it to that of the natural background radiation of Earth, and somehow, it worked. Artemis had no idea how he did it, but it worked. "So, if I can lower the amount I'm emitting, I must store it somewhere. I wonder if I can use it as an attack or something..." Artemis wondered. He did just absorb a lot of radiation in the reactor, so he theoretically could do something with it. He tried concentrating the radiation in his body into a beam coming out of his hand. Immediately, a beam of white shot out of his hand and impacted a building, causing a large explosion. As the smoke subsided, he noticed the building was completely destroyed. "Okay, too much. Maybe try something smaller." He focused on making a beam again, but much smaller. Another white beam appeared, and hit a tree. Rather than cause a large explosion, there was a small explosion. The tree did not survive it though.

As he continued testing out his beam power, trying to figure out how to control it's strength better, Artemis noticed that he started feeling weak. He was using all his radiation reserves. He needed more. Artemis looked around, and noticed that there was a lot of radiation coming out of the site of his first beam. He walked up to it, and noticed that there was a lot more radiation at that one site than he absorbed in the reactor. Artemis found that he was a source of radiation. He didn't just absorb it, he created it out of nowhere. He violated the laws of physics. "Huh, that's very interesting. I have an idea." Artemis figured that if he wanted to stop The Blessed, he would need to become some kind of superhero. He's always loved the idea of Iron Man, and how the suit was powered by the Arc Reactor. Maybe Artemis could channel the radiation he created naturally to make his own kind of Arc Reactor, and become a real life radiation-driven Iron Man. Artemis figured that if he could pull it off, he would.

One month of hard work, practice and learning new abilities later...

"All done!" Artemis smiled as he gazed upon his masterpiece. "I guess those engineering classes payed off." Standing in front of him was a 6'4" metal suit. It was very similar in design to the iconic Mark VII Iron Man suit. However, looks were the only similarity. During the month he spent building the suit, Artemis learned that he could perform different kinds of radioactive decay on elements in metals. He could also alter the properties of the metal so it could be what he wanted it to be. In the case of his suit, nigh indestructible yet very flexible. He also learned about his physics-breaking energy creation, and was able to use it to power the suit. He also took a bunch of Uranium from the reactors and lined the interior of the suit with it. That way, he was constantly absorbing more radiation. Artemis also made sure that the suit was insulated enough to not let people outside be damaged by radiation from the inside of the suit. While the interior of the suit averaged 100 Sv/h, right outside never reached above 1 uSv/h, which is a very safe amount. That's about as much radiation as a bushel of bananas. When in the suit, Artemis had super strength (100 tons), heightened agility, supersonic flight (Mach 3), the beam ability, and the ability to control radiation outside of the suit. The suit, as stated prior, was nigh-indestructible. Bulletproof, concussion proof, and able to take a very strong beating. The suit is durable enough to withstand a tactical nuke, extreme temperatures, underwater pressure up to a depth of 1 mile, space, and a blow equivalent to being hit by a tank going 100 mph. Needless to say, this suit was very strong. Artemis was very proud of his creation. He put on the suit, and flew back to his hometown, ready to take on The Blessed.

End of Chapter.
1153311111.title: Learning Control

115331112.content:
It had been a month since that day at Artemis' school. Since then, he'd been living alone within the highly radioactive city of Chernobyl. With no other people around, he couldn't hurt anyone. Also, he'd discovered that he could live off natural background radiation, meaning the location was perfect. However, Artemis was still worried about what The Blessed might be doing back home. So, he decided to create a suit that would contain the radiation he gave off, meaning he wouldn't have to worry about accidentally killing anyone again. The suit would need to be big however, as due to the radiation, Artemis had quickly grown to 7 feet tall.

First, he went around the city, collecting all the steel he could find. After a week, he had roughly ten tonnes of it. By using his radiation, he altered the steel's structure to be like that of diamond, increasing its strength by about 100 times. Then, he forced the atoms as close together as possible, to the point where the electrons were touching nuclei. This meant that the new steel took up the same space as 100kg of normal steel. After this, Artemis shaped the steel into a suit of armour, giving it a very squared appearance, since he wasn't going for aesthetics. Despite the suit's immense weight, by fitting powerful motors, Artemis could easily move around in it. The motors and the suit's systems, such as navigation, were powered by a small reactor driven by Artemis' own radiation, preventing a build up and explosion. To get off the ground, the suit was equipped with twin rocket engines on the back, and one on the back of each leg. However, as these were special nuclear-propelled rocket engines, they would never run out of fuel, and each produced roughly 100,000lb of thrust, more than enough to get the suit aitborn, and up to a speed of at least Mach 2. Also, the huge density of the steel meant that it was virtually indestructable, short of a nuclear bomb blast.
115331112.title: Power Contained.

choices: Cynthia takes Artemis to his parents. Artemis explains what has happened.
1153311121.content:
It had been almost two months since Artemis had left. Cynthia still hoped that he would come back soon, especially since The Blessed had been increasing their numbers. She was especially afraid, because one of her other friends, a girl named Anna, had told Cynthia that she had powers as well. Her power was telepathy, so she'd been able to hide from The Blessed for quite a while, but she was worried that they would find her soon.

One day, Cynthia and Anna had been talking during lunch, when the same group of Blessed from two months earlier, minus the boy that Artemis had accidentally killed, stormed into the school again. Anna threw up her telepathic barrier, hoping to conceal her powers.

"All right people, we know someone else here has powers. Now, this time we'll do things differently. If you don't join us, we'll start killing each of you until you decide to fess up!" the leader announced, as one boy in the group created a wall of ice, trapping everyone inside. The girl again searched for the person they were looking for. Despite Anna's best efforts, the other telepath was too powerful and broke through her barrier.

"It's her." the girl said, pointing at Anna. However, before the leader could respond, a loud rumbling sound was heard. The leader turned around, as something dropped from the sky and slammed into the ground. As the dust settled, it revealed a large humanoid figure, covered in thick, genmetal-grey armour, red eyes glowing in its helmet. Another red light, circular this time, glowed in its chestplate.

"What the hell? Titan, get rid of that pile of scrap metal." the leader shouted, gesturing to the tall, strong boy behind him. Titan nodded, charging towards the figure. His fist slammed into its chest with such force that the air shook. Amazingly, the armoured figure didn't budge. Then, it grabbed Titan's head with its large armoured gauntlet, lifting him off his feet. Suddenly, a red-coloured wave of energy erupted from the gauntlet. Titan screamed, as the energy coursed through his body. After a moment, his head exploded, blood splattering over the figure's armour. The figure slowly started to walk forward, its armour clanking loudly with each step.

"You monster!" yelled the leader, trying to lift the figure with his telekinetic powers. However, he discovered the armour was so dense, that he couldn't lift it, no matter how hard he concentrated. The girl tried to blast the figure's mind, but the armour's density meant her thoughts couldn't get through.

"Leave, now!" shouted the figure, raising its right gauntlet again. The Blessed, already terrified, ran ffor their lives, desparate to get away from this nightmarish thing in front of them. The figure then approached Cynthia and Anna. the twpo girls screamed, afraid of what the armoured figure might do.

"Please don't be scared. I don't want to hurt you" the figure told them, its deep voice now quiet. It then knelt in front of the girls. "Are you alright, Cynthia, Anna?" it asked.

"H-How do you know our names?" Cynthia asked, still frightened.

"Cynthia, it's me." the figure replied, removing its helmet. Cynthia gasped. Even though his hair was now bleached white, presumably a side effect of the radiation, and his eyes were glowing green, she recognised that smile.

"Artemis?!" she gasped, her eyes brimming with tears. Artemis nodded slowly.]

"I'm glad you're still okay." he said. He was surprised when Cynthia hugged him tightly, despite the blood on his armour. Artemis placed his hand on her back, careful not to crush her with his armour's strength.

12412.content:
Wolf ran as fast as he could from the thugs who tried to attack him and rob him in the deserted alley, and ended up at the public park, which was three blocks away, and across the street.

He was tired and thirsty, but luckily there was a water drinking fountain there, where he was able to get a drink of water. He sat down on the park bench, where he tried to clear his mind and think about what had just happened a few minutes before, in the alley. He realized that he came dangerously close to being robbed, or even stabbed with a knife, but in the end, he was able to enter his attacker's mind and make him stab one of the other guys instead! It was as if he could control the minds of other people! Did he possess some kind of super power?

Just then, he heard a girl screaming from a distance.

"Stay away from me!"

Wolf got up and ran towards her voice and spotted a tall boy running after a younger girl. The girl seemed about 12 and the boy was about 15 or so.

"It's my lunch money!" the girl shouted.

"Give it to me!" the boy yelled back.

"Hey! Leave her alone!" Wolf said to the boy.

"Mind your own business, you twerp!" the boy said. Clearly, the boy was taller and stronger than Wolf, who was only 13.

"Go away!" Wolf shouted back.

"I'm gonna break your neck..." the boy said, in a threatening tone of voice, as he approached Wolf.

"GO AWAY!" Wolf shouted again.

Then, the boy suddenly turned around, and started to run.

"Hey! I'm.... What... is... going... on..." he panted, as he started to run farther and father away from Wolf and the girl.

The boy ran and ran, until he was out of sight. That's when he stopped running.

The boy then turned around and started running towards Wolf.

"Run around those trees over there!" Wolf commanded, while pointing at three trees, which were located close to each other.

The boy jogged over to the trees and started running laps around them, in a wide circle, until he nearly collapsed from exhaustion.

"He won't bother you anymore..." Wolf said to the girl. "Are you alright?"

"Yeah.... How... How did you do that?" she asked him.

"I... I don't know..." he replied.

Then he turned around and walked away. He stopped by the tree, and saw the boy, who was breathing very deep. He was extremely tired and his face was all sweaty.

"Leave the girl alone!" Wolf said to him.

He just stared at him, with a touch of fear in his eyes.

Wolf then turned around and walked away.
12412.title: a park

choices: Wolf tells Jake about his powers
Wolf decides to keep his powers a secret a little longer
124122.content:
Wolf turned around and walked along the outer edge of the park, which was luckily inside a large neighborhood subdivision, where he lived. It was summer, in the middle of July, and he had nothing else to do, so he just stumbled around for awhile.

Finally, he came across a grass field where he spotted two boys, who were wearing soccer cleats, socks, shorts and jerseys, and they were kicking around a soccer ball. Wolf recognized them as Jake and his younger brother Kyle, who lived just down the street from his house. Jake played on the same soccer team as Wolf did, on Saturday mornings.

"Hey, guys! What's up?" Wolf said to them.

"Yo, Wolf! Kick it back!" Jake said, as he sent the ball straight to Wolf.

Wolf stopped the ball from rolling past him, with his right foot, before he kicked it back to Jake.

"Hey! What about me?" Kyle cried out.

Jake just ignored his little brother and kicked the ball back to Wolf, but this time, Wolf kicked it to Kyle instead.

"Kick it over here, Kyle!" Jake ordered.

But Kyle just kicked it to Wolf, when Jake ran in front of him, and intercepted the ball. Jake rolled the ball out of the way, until he was standing farther away from both Kyle and Wolf.

"Hey! That's cheating!" Kyle protested, as Jake kicked the ball back to Wolf.

"Come on, you guys! We can all play!" Wolf sighed.

"Jake's not sharing!" Kyle protested.

"Okay... Jake, pass to Kyle!" Wolf ordered, after he had kicked the ball back to Jake.

"What? But I don't wanna... Uhh..." Jake began to say, when Wolf concentrated his power on him.

Then Jake looked down at the soccer ball and kicked it straight at Wolf, who kicked it to Kyle.

"Now, kick it to me!" Wolf told Kyle.

"What... Oh... Okay..." Kyle replied, who kicked it right back to Wolf.

Wolf just smiled. He didn't really want to use his mind control powers on his best friends, but it was the only wat to stop the two brothers from arguing.

After they had finished kicking the ball around for a few minutes, they decided to walk over to Jake and Kyle's house for a little while...
124122.title: Wolf went to a friend's house

choices: Wolf shows Jake more mind control tricks
Wolf makes Jake run a lap around the house
1241221.content:
After the time spent playing soccer at the park, Wolf followed Jake and Kyle to their house. They walked in, and got some cold water to drink in the kitchen, before Jake took Wolf upstairs to his bedroom. There, Jake closed his bedroom door, so that his little brother wouldn’t be able to come in and bother them anymore.

“Dude, I got something really cool to show you…” Wolf mentioned, as he sat down at the edge of Jake’s bed, while Jake sat down in the chair by his desk.

“Oh? What were you going to show me?” Jake wondered.

“I… I think I gained some weird superpower or something…” Wolf said in a soft tone of voice.

“Say what?”

“Like… I was able to control the minds of other people and make them do stuff…” Wolf continued.

“Whoa! That’s freaky! I mean… Are you sure?”

“Yeah… I used it on your little bro while we were playing soccer outside!” Wolf explained.

“You’re kidding me!”

“Nope! He was about to argue with you, but I made him kick the ball to you!”

“Oh, no way! No freaking way!” Jake said.

“I swear!”

“Prove it!”

Wolf stared at Jake and concentrated on making him stand up and walk towards the middle of the bedroom.

Suddenly, Jake got up from his chair, and remained standing right by his desk.

“Hey! What…. What the heck?” Jake gasped.

Then Jake started to take three steps towards the middle of the bedroom, facing Wolf.

“Hey! HEY! Are… Are you doing this to me?” Jake protested, while he was walking towards the middle of the bedroom.

“Yeah…” Wolf replied calmly.

Then, while standing in the center of the room, Jake flexed his calves, and stood on his toes for a few seconds, before lowering his heels again.

“Whoa! That… That was wicked!” Jake shouted. “You made me stand on my toes!”

“Alright, Jake… Now… HOP!” Wolf commanded.

Jake hopped in the air and landed on his feet.

“WHOA!” Jake gasped. “What the---?”

“HOP… HOP… HOP!” Wolf ordered.

Jake’s legs flexed and launched him straight into the air, and then he landed back on his feet, every time Wolf said the word “HOP”.

“HEY! STOP… STOP IT!” Jake gasped. “I… I believe you!”

“Ha ha!” Wolf laughed. “I can make you hop like a bunny rabbit, every time I say the magic word!”

Jake just stared at his friend with his mouth wide open as Wolf grinned at him…
1241221.title: Wolf tells Jake about his powers

choices: Wolf uses his powers on another student at school
Wolf uses his powers on Jake once again
12412211.content:
“Dude, that is so awesome that you can make me do stuff!” Jake panted, as he was just regaining his composure. “I can’t believe it!”

“Just wait till I try this out in school!” Wolf replied.

Wolf then left Jake alone for the rest of the day, and the boys just played video games.

The next day, they boys sat next to each other in English class during first period, when Mrs. Ward walked in and decided to give a pop quiz!

“Okay, we’re going to give an oral exam!” she said to the class. All the students gasped out loud. “We had to memorize the books of the New Testament last week, and I’m going to see who did their homework!”

Mrs. Ward then scanned the classroom for the first student to call on.

“Jake!” she said.

Jake looked up with a startled expression on his face.

“Give me the first four books of the New testament!” she requested.

“Ummm… Uhhh….” Jake stammered, racking his brain. He clearly had not studied for the pop quiz. Wolf knew the answers, so he used his mind control powers to take over Jake’s mind.

“Umm… Matthew, Mark, Luke and John!” Jake replied.

“Very good, Jake!” Mrs. Ward replied. “For a moment it looked as if you didn’t know the answer…”

Mrs. Ward then asked another student a question, leaving Jake to let out a deep sigh of relief. Jake just smiled, however, as he turned and looked at Wolf, who returned a wide grin. Jake knew that Wolf had helped him out, using his awesome mind-control powers!
12412211.title: Wolf shows Jake more mind control tricks

choices: Wolf makes Jake do stuff in school
Wolf makes Jake talk for him in school
124122112.content:
Jake and Wolf were walking down the hall at school the next day when Jake spotted Cindy, a girl he really liked. He stared at her the whole time and Wolf took notice.

"Who's that?" he asked.

"It's Cindy, I think she's cute..." Jake replied.

"Have told her you liked her?"

"No..."

"Why not?"

"Too scared and too shy..." Jake sighed.

"Let me help you overcome your shyness!" Wolf grinned.

Right away, Jake felt Wolf's powers take control of his mind and body. Jake suddenly realized that his legs started to walk towards the spot where Cindy was standing!

"Ummm.... hi, Cindy!" Jake said to her, even though he was under Wolf's control.

"Oh, hi there, Jake!" the cute girl replied with a smile.

"Cindy... I just saw you standing there, and... I just wanted to let you know that... I think you're very beautiful!" Jake said softly.

"Ooooohh.... How sweet of you, Jake! Thank you!" Cindy said, as she bent over and kissed Jake on his cheek, before stepping back. "I think you're cute!"

Then Cindy turned around and walked away, giggling...

Wolf looked on and laughed.

"Come on, Romeo, let's go to class!" Wolf said, as Jake joined him. "I just noticed something about my powers...."

"What?" Jake asked him.

"The more I control you, the easier it gets..." Wolf said. "But, it's becoming a bit too easy for me to control you from now on...."

Jake turned towards him with a confused look on his face.

"Huh?"

"My powers won't let go of you... I feel like I can control you all the time now!" Wolf stated.

Jake's mouth dropped open. In a way he thought it would be cool to be controlled by his best friend all the time, every day...

"Really?"

1343111.content:
Author’s Note: In Hebrew, the name Arnon means “roaring stream”.

A big brown dump truck, loaded with trash, had arrived near the beach. This was just a few miles south of Miami, in the state of Florida. The truck had arrived there, and was heading towards a small concrete platform, which lowered straight into the water. It was 3 o’clock in the morning, and nobody was around.

The driver put the large dump truck in reverse and allowed the truck to slowly slide down the concrete slope until the rear tires were barely reaching the water. Then, the driver reached down, and pulled another lever, causing the engine to engage and rise up the big dump bin in the back, which contained all the trash. As the dumper raiser up higher and higher, the rear side remained level, so that all the trash slowly moved to the back until it fell out of the back of the dumper and poured out of the dumper into the ocean.

Once the dumper bin was completely raised up and had dumped all of its contents into the ocean, the driver pulled the lever back up, and the front end of the dump bin got lowered back onto the chassis of the dump truck. This time, the dumper was empty, and all the trash had been dumped into the ocean.

The driver then put the truck into its first gear, and drove off, having completed its job, of adding more trash to the ocean, not knowing that he was being watched by two mysterious beings.

A man and a woman were standing there, observing the scene from a distance. They were clearly troubled by what they had seen. The couple was young, tall and strong. They wore sandals and they were completely dressed in long, white robes.

“Modern man has no respect for the sea! This is a crying shame!” the man shouted out angrily. “What must I do to teach these humans to respect the seven seas? They use the sea to dump their trash! It is a disgrace!”

“Maybe we should show the humans that the sea can be used for good things… Not just to dump their trash… Maybe…” the woman thought out loud.

“I will use the sea to destroy them! ALL OF THEM! The sea that takes their trash and their refuse will flood them! I will flood their cities and beaches and towns! I will make them respect the seas!” the man growled.

“Honey! Come down! You won’t teach them anything by doing that!” the woman pleaded to her husband.

“Do you have any better ideas, my love?” the man asked her calmly.

“Show them, how powerful the seas can be! Show them, what the sea can do! Live among them for a while!” she said.

“My love, I’m a god… I do not wish to live among ordinary mortals who eat fish and who pollute the seas with their filth… It disgusts me…”

“Then… Send someone else… Or… Let’s… Let’s create someone… “

The man stared at the woman.

“My love… If we create a son… He will be a god on Earth… he will live and walk among ordinary humans as a deity… He will stick out like a sore thumb…” the man said angrily.

“Yes, but he will be able to command the seas… he will command water and live in the ocean… he will be a hero among ordinary men…” she replied.

“I don’t like it…”

“What if… he were a boy… a child?” she wondered.

The man and turned to face the woman and smiled…

“We will create a young boy from the sand and the stones and the sea shells found on this beach… He will be a god who will live among ordinary people… He will have the divine power to command the oceans and he will learn at a very young age to demonstrate that power before all other human beings. And, because he will be a god, he cannot be harmed or hurt in any way…” the man said calmly. “So, it will be done…”

Three days later…

Richard and Maria were a young couple who had moved from Michigan to Florida. They had been in Florida for twenty years and they both worked as part of a cleaning crew for a large hotel near South Beach near Miami. They had managed to work their way up and save some money so that they could afford a small house and buy a used car so they could get around town.

Every Sunday they would go to church and they would help collect food for the homeless shelter and they would teach poor or homeless children as well. Eventually, they had a son and a daughter of their own, named Miguel and Diana, ages 3 and 2.

One day, after both Richard and Maria had come home from work and Maria had just serving chicken soup and beans for dinner, there was a loud knocking on the door. Since they lived walking distance from the beach, Richard thought that it was one of the fishermen, asking for something to eat.

When Richard opened the door, he found, sitting at his front doorstep, a large wooden basket with a little baby boy, wrapped in fine blankets and a small card attached to his blanket.

The card read: “Please take care of Arnon and raise him to be big and strong. Treat him special, for he is a god of the sea. Poseidon and Amphitrite”.

“What?” Richard wondered, as he looked down at the little baby in the basket. The baby looked up at him and smiled. Realizing that he couldn’t just leave the baby outside, Richard took the basket with the baby boy, and took him inside.

Arnon grew up quickly and became a strong, healthy boy. He was never sick. He never even got a cold. When Miguel and Diana came down with the flu, with chicken pox, or even with dengue, Arnon never caught any of it. He was always perfectly healthy and strong.

Richard always wondered why that was. He had hidden the card, which said that Arnon was a god of the sea. He decided to keep it a secret, until the day would come, that the secret had to be revealed to Arnon about his origin…

13431112.content:
Thirteen years after the mysterious basket was left at Richard and Maria Medina’s doorstep, the young baby, named Arnon, had grown into a strong, young man. He was short, with black straight hair and bright blue eyes, but he was far more muscular than most other boys of his age. He wasn’t taller than them, but he seemed to be more athletic.

One day, a young couple was visiting and they were wading in the water. They had just gotten married the previous week, and the man was showing his new wife the new wedding ring. The wife had placed the ring on her finger and decided to go swimming, when she suddenly let out a loud shriek.

“Oh no! MY RING!” she shouted. “I lost my ring!”

Her husband quickly waded over to where she was standing, since they were both about knee-high in the water, and they frantically started searching for the ring, which had slipped from her finger and dropped in the water.

Miguel, Diana and Arnon had heard the commotion, along with Aaron and Paul, two boys who lived right down the street from Miguel and Arnon. All of them suddenly raced into the water and started searching for the missing ring.

“Where were you standing, when you lost the ring?” Arnon asked the lady.

“Right here!” she replied. “I just can’t see a thing, because of all the water!”

Arnon walked over to where she was standing, and then he took a few steps back. The water wasn’t clear, so it was pretty much impossible to see where the ring would have landed on the ground.

Strangely enough, Arnon began to feel a sense of calling, as if the sea began to call out to him. Something inside of him told him, that he could utter silent commands, and that the seas would obey them. He wished for the water around him and the lady to pull back, so that he could see the ground. That way, he would spot the missing ring and find it for the lady, who was so upset about losing her wedding ring.

“Seas… Go away!” he said out loud.

Then, it happened. The moment Arnon had uttered his command, the seas pulled back, right where he was standing, uncovering all the ground where Arnon, the couple, and the other kids had been looking for the missing ring. Now, they were all standing in wet sand, surrounded by rocks and shells.

“Ahh… I see it!” Arnon, smiled, as he bent down and picked up the ring, which was covered with sand. “Here you go, ma’am!” he smiled, as he handed the wedding ring back to the lady.

“Oh my gosh… Thank you! Thank you so much!” she stuttered. “But… How… What… W-w-what happened? Is there… l-l-low tide?”

Arnon turned to face the ocean and wished for the water to rush back.

“Seas… Come back!” Arnon commanded.

Just as he commanded, the sea returned and soon, the boys found their legs surrounded by flowing sea water.

“Whoa!” Miguel gasped.

“Hey! How did you do that?” Aaron said to him.

“I… Uhmm…” Arnon stuttered. “I don’t know… I just did…”

Just then, Richard was walking past the beach, when Miguel ran up to him, with Diana right behind him.

“Daddy! Daddy! Guess what just happened? Arnon made the water go away from the beach, so that he could retrieve the ring for that lady! He made the whole beach grow wider by pushing back the water for a minute or so! Isn’t that cool?” Miguel shouted at his father.

“Oh dear… Ooooh dear….” Richard sighed. “Arnon, Miguel, and Diana… Let’s get in the house…” Richard ordered his children.

Miguel and Arnon dashed out of the water and ran towards the house, with Diana running right behind them.

As soon as they got to the door, they grabbed the towels, which were hanging from the stairway by the door, and they dried off. Then they took turns to shower and they put on some clean shirts and t-shirts.

Miguel and Arnon shared the same bedroom, and both boys were sitting on Arnon’s bed, when Richard walked in the room, carrying a small card. Maria and Diana also joined him.

“Arnon… I got this when you were delivered to our doorstep, thirteen years ago…” he said, as he handed the boy the card.

“Uhmm… Arnon… that’s me… god of the sea… Poseidon and Amphitrite?” Arnon wondered out loud, as he read the text on the card.

“Yes. Poseidon and Amphitrite are your real parents, Arnon…” Richard said calmly.

“What? You… You’re not my real dad? Mom?” Arnon replied, with a tear coming from his eyes.

“No, my boy. You’re the son of Poseidon. You’re a god of the sea. You were left on our doorstep for us to raise…”

“A god of the sea? No way!” Miguel said out loud. “My little brother is a god?”

“This is a joke, right? This can’t be true! I’m just a kid! I’m a normal kid! I’m just like Miguel and Paul and Aaron!” Arnon shouted back.

“I’m afraid not, Arnon…. “Richard responded.

Richard and Maria walked up to Arnon and they embraced him.

“We still love you like our son, Arnon…” Maria spoke. “You’re still our son… No matter what the card says…”

“I… I love you too, mom….” Arnon replied, no longer able to hold back the tears.

Meanwhile, Miguel and Diana had gone back outside, where they had spotted Paul and Aaron.

“You guys want to come and play with us?” Miguel asked them.

“I dunno dude… I saw what your little bro did at the beach…. That was really, really weird…” Aaron sneered.

“Guys… Arnon can do that… He’s a god of the sea….” Miguel said honestly.

“WHAT!? Ohmygosh…. Now this is really getting weird!” Paul laughed. “Well I’m not going to bow down and worship your little bro if he’s the god of the sea! Forget it!”

Paul turned around and walked away, angrily….

Miguel became very sad and worried, wondering what it would be like when the new school year started the following week. Paul was in the same class as Arnon, and now that he knew about Arnon’s powers, things could only mean trouble…

My story begins at a high school. Myself and my friends are hanging about in the playground when a box flies over the wall and lands beside us. Jane, oh Jane, where did it all go wrong, picked it up and looked at it. As we gathered around, studying the box, it opened of it's own accord. A blue mist came out and circled around us, then went back into the box. A red mist followed the same trajectory then it too went back to the box. A rock floated out of the box and circled us followed by a gust of air. Once the strange mists and rock had gone back into the box, the box glowed and the glow enveloped all of us. After that, we found ourselves on the ground exactly where we had found the box, only the box was gone.

1453111.content:
"Explain to me again why we are here" Alex asked Marcene.
"Because you need to get out more and try new things" Marcene hissed back at him.

Marcene pushed back her black hair as she and Alex lay on a hill overlooking the factory beneath you. Well, Factory was the incorrect term, 'crazy testing facility' would be more accurate.
"I'm not breaking into a government lab!" Alex pouted. "So maybe I DO need to get out more, but that doesn't mean I have to do illegal things!"
"Come on, have some fun once in a while!" Marcene groaned.
"Fun for me is curled up in my room playing games on my console!"
"Only fun for so long..."
"I've done it for years!"
"Well now you can try something new!"

Alex sighed. He was never going to win against Marcene. She was always trying to drag him on harebrained adventures - half of them illegal - just for the sake of doing it. Either way, there was no way he was getting out of this one.
"Alright. Fine. We'll try and break in. Oh wise one, tell me how break into a GOVERNMENT FACILITY" Alex said with a heavy heart of sarcasm.
"I swiped a keycard"
"Marcene!"
"What? It was... lying around..."
"On someone's belt?"
"Well he wasn't using it"
"I bet..."

You and Marcene watched as the last of the lights went out in the facility. Your parents were away for the weekend so they wouldn't be questioning why you weren't home before it got dark.
"Front door or back door?" Marcene asked, grinning at you.
1453111.title: Yes

choices: Too late, security has found you!
14531112.content:
"Back door's safer... Your crazy Marcene..." You told her.
"Crazy enough to break into a government facility? Yes, I should think so" She grinned.

Avoiding the rotating automated spotlight, you crept up to the door and Marcene pushed the swipe card through the reader. It gave a satisfied double beep and you heard the door click open. Marcene crept in slowly, with you behind her.
"Anything in particular you wanting to swipe?" You asked her. You didn't even know what went on here.
"No idea what they even do here. I'm makin-"
"-Making it up as you go... figured" You finished her sentence.

You and Marcene made your way through the dark corridors, taking care to avoid the light so as to try and stay out of vision of the cameras.
"Hey, a lab - wanna check it out?" Marcene asked you.
"Like I gotta choice" You shrugged.
"Can you at least try and enjoy this?" Marcene pouted.
You rolled your eyes and opened the door.

The lab was mostly dark except for the far corner which had a table lamp still on, focused directly down on a small vial of green, translucent liquid.
Around the rest of the lab was machinery far beyond your comprehension - all of which seemed mostly for working with various liquids - heating and cooling them... and mixing? You couldn't tell at all.
"Anything interesting?" Marcene asked, perusing the shelves before turning to you.
"Not really. I don't understand any of this" You said. "Although that vial there under the light looks weird"
Both you and Marcene moved to inspect it.
"Dare you to drink it" She teased.
"Hell no!"
"What's the worst that could happen?" She asked.
"I could... I dunno... DIE?" You snapped.
"Alright, chill." She said, losing interest in it and moving away to look at something else.

You looked away to find anything else interesting in the lab. It couldn't have happened at a worse time, but you suddenly slipped on the polished floor and your bottom hit the ground. Reaching out to save yourself, you caught the edge of the bench, knocking it badly and smaking the vial, causing it to tip over and pour the liquid right out... conveniently into your mouth as you lay on the ground dazed.

The liquid burned as it sizzled down your throat. You tried to cough it out but to no avail.
"Damn! You alright Alex?" Marcene was by your side, pulling you up.
The best you could do was hack and cough to try and get it out, but it was all for naught.
"Uhhh, we should get out of here!" She cried, dragging you to the door.
14531112.title: Where it all goes wrong.

choices: It doesn't work. Maybe something else?
145311121.content:
The escape from the facility was barely memorable. You stumbled the whole way, your vision blurred and your chest burning. By the time you made it back to your place - Marcene having dragged you for most of it - you were feeling a little bit better.
"The hell was that stuff?" She asked.
"Dunno... but if I ain't dead now I guess I'll be okay" You huffed.

You unlocked the door, went to your room and crashed in the bed with a resounding thump.
"It's probably best for you to not be alone tonight" Marcene said.
"Your house is crazy and noisy at night. I am not going there" You responded, waving your finger in there.
"Then I'll crash on your couch" Marcene laughed.
"Whatever" You replied, falling asleep.

-----

You awoke with a start, sitting up in bed and looking around with a daze. Some loose hair was in your face so you pushed it back with your hands.
"That's odd... I don't have long hair" You murmured. Then you shouted with a start.
"My voice! What the hell!?" You shouted - noticing that your voice had changed to a female. Looking down you discovered that your entire body was different - now female. You even had breasts.

"Please be a dream..." You cried. But nothing changed. You had no idea that you'd change into a woman over night - what was in that vial?

Getting out of bed carefully, through the daze and confusion you at least made out that you retained your clothes from last night - that was a relief. If Marcene was about though, she'd either freak out or find it totally cool.
Opening up your phones camera, you looked at the display and found your new face was... oddly familiar. Very familiar.
"Eianna?" You murmured.
Eianna was a popular female from an RPG you had been playing recently on your console. She was a significant person to the main protagonist and despite getting into trouble many times, she made a useful companion and a decent fighter. She had become quite popular on the internet and even had a few meme's made about her. Though you'd never admit it, you had fantasized about you and her as a couple.

Praying against all odds and closing your eyes, you thought about trying to change back...
145311121.title: You get away safely.

155.content:
Janis LaRue ran down the sidewalk, trying to get away. Three men in suits ran after him, shouting for him to stop.
He rounded the corner..cursing to himself. You'd think it would be easy to lose someone on the busy streets on New York.

As he got close to the end of the street, he stopped. In front of him were 7 men with guns pointed at him. The three men behind him finally caught up.
"Surrender Janis..there's nowhere you can go."
Janis turned and faced the men behind him.
"Is that so?" The man shifted anxiously.

From what he saw...Janis had a scary side. Even the doctors that worked on him feared him to some extent.
"Remember this..i am unstoppable. I can do anything..go anywhere...create anything.
Fools like you can hardly scare me."

A couple of the men opened fire.
Janis twisted quickly and dodged the bullets.
"What?"
Janis faced the men.
"Not going to listen...then i'll show you!"

Janis clapped his hands together and lightning flew from his hands.
Janis shouted "Now beg for your lives you pathetic fools!"
